entry.title: Combat animations - Kickboxing and Muay Thai V2

link.href: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Combat animations - Kickboxing and Muay Thai V2/ignore-index-en/

entry.id: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Combat animations - Kickboxing and Muay Thai V2/ignore-index-en/

content.xml:base: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Combat animations - Kickboxing and Muay Thai V2/ignore-index-en/

entry.content:
Collection of animations for Kickboxing and Muay Thai part 2

A set of 31 third-person Kickboxing and Muay Thai animations

Pose matched start and end frames

Humanoid 3D animations, animations movements for retargeting to other humanoid 3D characters.

The first part of these Muay Thai animations is here


We invite you to visit my page. There are other works we would like you to see here.

entry.title: Combat animations - Kickboxing and Muay Thai V2
entry.content:
Collection of animations for Kickboxing and Muay Thai part 2

A set of 31 第三人称踢拳和泰拳动画

姿势匹配的起始和结束帧

类人3D动画，动画动作可重新定向到其他类人3D角色。

这些泰拳动画的第一部分在 这里

我们邀请您访问我的页面。还有其他作品我们希望您能看到 这里。

entry.title: Combat animations - Kickboxing and Muay Thai V1

content.xml:base: https://yzzfo.github.io/unity/store/Combat animations - Kickboxing and Muay Thai V1/ignore-index-en/

entry.content:
Collection of animations for Kickboxing and Muay Thai

Mirrored movements in succession - https://youtu.be/ZlOfiNEiThM

A set of 19 third-person Kickboxing and Muay Thai animations

Pose matched start and end frames

Humanoid 3D animations, animations movements for retargeting to other humanoid 3D characters.

The second part of these Muay Thai animations is here


We invite you to visit my page. There are other works we would like you to see here.

entry.title: Combat animations - Kickboxing and Muay Thai V1
entry.content:
Kickboxing和Muay Thai的动画合集

连续的镜像动作 - https://youtu.be/ZlOfiNEiThM

一组19个第三人称Kickboxing和Muay Thai动画

姿势匹配的起始和结束帧

类人3D动画，适用于重新定向到其他类人3D角色的动画动作。

这些Muay Thai动画的第二部分在这里

我们邀请您访问我的页面。还有其他作品希望您能看到这里。
